categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Retribution was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer.
The vessel was attached to the Qeimet fleet and functioned as home base for the TIE bombers of Scimitar assault wing.

Retribution was later found to have been appropriated by Moff Lobax Resuun of the Tamarin sector, some time after the Battle of Endor. It was part of his personal fleet and served as Resuun's base of operations. Being established in a Star Destroyer allowed the governor to move around the sector at will.
